verses.name: Genesis 10:24
verses.text: And Arphaxad begat Salah; and Salah begat Eber.

verses.name: Genesis 10:25
verses.text: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of one was Peleg; for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother’s name was Joktan.

verses.name: Genesis 10:26
verses.text: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

verses.name: Genesis 10:27
verses.text: And Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,

verses.name: Genesis 10:28
verses.text: And Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

verses.name: Genesis 10:29
verses.text: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these were the sons of Joktan.

verses.name: Genesis 10:30
verses.text: And their dwelling was from Mesha, as thou goest unto Sephar a mount of the east.
